item.description:
So, based on the number of people interested....I am delighted to offer my workshop ?discover your d spot - creating passion, love and connection in the new year"!

There is a $15/person fee for it but it is well worth it! The workshop is a two hour workshop!

The workshop is on taking control of your dating and relationship destiny!

Are you ready for a true and lasting relationship?
Want the secret to attracting the perfect man for you?
Can you commit to making this the best year of your life?

The evening will focus on :

? the Ten Cardinal Rules of a Love Relationship
? Creating Totally Fulfilling Relationships
? Designing Your Ultimate Mate
? What Makes a Relationship Work
? Attracting your Ideal Relationship


It is a personal experience so although we do it together....you will each be asked to answer some pretty deep and honest questions! It is great for men and women....anyone who wants to find or improve the relationship in your life!

I am still finding a location...it will be in New Haven so you can plan accordingly!

Please RSVP through meetup!
Laura
item.why: It will be a fabulous and fun evening!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: "discover your D spot - creating passion, love and connection in the new year"
